item.title: 与技术相关的书籍很​​好
item.description:
我经常发现自己有时间听一本书，但不一定要读（walking狗，抱着婴儿等）。 有哪些优秀的技术或技术贴上的书籍在音频上有什么好？ Here are some I've listened to over the years already:- Sandworm: A New Era of Cyber​​war and the Hunt for the Kremlin's Most Dangerous Hackers https://www.goodreads.com/book/show/41436213-sandworm)- Countdown to Zero Day: Stuxnet and the Launch of the World's First Digital Weapon - https://www.goodreads.com/book/show/18465875-countdown-countdown-countdown-to-zero-day-----算法的生活：人类决策的计算机科学 - https：//www.goodreads.com//book/book/book/book/book/book/book/show/256666050------25666050----- https://www.goodreads.com/book/show/150731.alan_turing
注释url： https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=444270736 点：2 ＃评论：0
